newsitem.title: USA: Sterling Commerce approves share offering.
newsitem.headline: Sterling Commerce approves share offering.

text.p: Sterlin Commerce Inc said on Monday that its board of directors has approved a public offering of 12.5 million shares of its common stock.
The managing underwriters for the offering will be Alex Brown & Sons Inc and Goldman Sachs & Co.
Underwriters will be granted an over-allotment option to purchase up to an additional 1.875 million shares from Sterling Commerce, the company said.
Sterling Commerce vice president of investor relations Dawn Wheeler said the company is selling all the shares in the offering.
The total of shares outstanding will increase to 87.5 million after the offering, Wheeler said.
